name: Conversion for Tracktum on Woocommerce
author: Md Kamrul islam

sections.description:
Tracktum is Woocommerce Conversion plugin for Google, Facebook, Pinterest.
Tracktum inserts Javascript codes on WooCommerce cart page, checkout success page and after user registration. So you can track who are adding your products to cart, who are purchase them and who are registering to your site.

Features

  • Add to Cart Event
  • Add to Wishlist Event
  • Purchase Event
  • Registration Event
  • Wishlist Event
  • Product View Event
  • ViewCategory Event
  • Search Event

v1.3 (09 March, 2021)

  • update: Add ViewContent Event For Google
  • update: Add Search Event For Google
  • update: Add Wishlist Event For Google

v1.2 (31 Janurary, 2021)

  • update: Add ViewCategory Event For Facebook
  • update: Add Search Event For Facebook

v1.1 (27 Janurary, 2021)

  • update: Add Wishlist Event For Facebook
  • update: Add Product View Event For Facebook
